title: Kylie Jenner Was Spotted At The Same Club As Tyga Just Days After Denying That “2am Date”
text:
Kylie Jenner has been spotted at the same club as ex-beau Tyga just days after denying she shared a “2am date” with him. This could just be a coincidence but also, we’ll probably end up watching this on the next season of Keeping Up With The Kardashians so ¯\_(ツ)_/¯.

Righto, so according to E!News, Kylie and sister Khloé Kardashian were snapped enjoying a gals night at The Hyde nightclub in West Hollywood. Khloé’s ex-husband Lamar Odom was also spotted at the club with his girlfriend, Sabrina Parr. It’s unclear whether or not the exes exchanged polite peasantries or just made awkward eye contact but again, we’ll probably find out next season.

Kylie and Travis Scott – parents of wee angel Stormi Webster – are reportedly “taking space apart” after being together for more than two years. Neither party confirmed the split… that is until Kylie took to her socials to deny she had that “2am date” with Tyga.

The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is. There was no “2am date with Tyga”. You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at. — Kylie Jenner (@KylieJenner) October 3, 2019

“Travis and I are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi,” she continued. “Our friendship and our daughter is priority.”

Sources have told multiple outlets that Kylie and Travis’ split is not official.

“It’s not a firm split. They’ve been fighting again, but have still seen each other within this last month.”

About a gazillion rumours have since hit the internet, each claiming to know the reason behind the split. According to Entertainment Tonight, Kylie wanted Travis to be “more dedicated to the family.” Again, this is from a mysterious source so grain of salt.

“Kylie is young, but she really wants the traditional family life. She has seen her older sisters with big families and multiple kids and she wants the same,” the source continued.

But ultimately, their “priorities are different” right now.

The source added Kylie also has some trust issues, claiming Travis was caught “messaging another girl on Instagram.”

And then, there’s Travis’ alleged secret girlfriend. I just – it’s too much. But if you want to read more about said secret girlfriend, aggressively click on the below.

For what it’s worth, Travis has absolutely denied these cheating rumours. In an Instagram Story posted over the weekend, he wrote: “It’s really affecting when u see false things said about u once again these false stories about me cheating are just simply not true. Focusing on life, music, and family at this moment is what’s real.”
description: Kylie Jenner has been spotted at the same club as ex-beau Tyga just days after denying they shared a "2am date" with him.
